item.title: Vance-hosted Greenland meeting ends with ‘fundamental disagreement’
item.description: Diplomats from Denmark and Greenland had originally requested the meeting with Secretary of State Marco Rubio after provocative statements from the pr...

item.title: FBI executes search warrant at Washington Post reporter’s home
item.description: The search came as part of an investigation into a government contractor accused of illegally retaining classified government materials.

item.title: Supreme Court allows Illinois congressman to challenge mail-in balloting
item.description: The high court’s 7-2 ruling dealt with the narrow question of whether Republican congressman Michael Bost and others had standing to sue.

item.title: U.S. withdraws some forces from Middle East as Trump weighs Iran strikes
item.description: The Pentagon has begun removing troops and equipment from al-Udeid Air Base in Qatar, echoing measures taken before U.S. strikes on Iran’s nuclear fac...

item.title: Trump makes obscene gesture, mouths expletive at Detroit factory heckler
item.description: A cellphone video captured Trump twice mouthing “f--- you” and raising his middle finger toward a line worker shouting at him inside the Ford factory.
